mergePdf.title: Merge PDF
mergePdf.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.
mergePdf.sortByFileNameDescription: Sort PDFs alphabetically by file name
mergePdf.sortByUploadOrderDescription: Keep PDFs in the order they were uploaded

toolInfo.title: Merge PDF Files
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to combine multiple PDF files into a single document. You can choose how to sort the PDFs and the tool will merge them in the specified order.

mergePdf.title: Merge PDF
mergePdf.shortDescription: Merge multiple PDF files into a single document

splitPdf.title: Split PDF
splitPdf.description: Extract specific pages from a PDF document.
splitPdf.pageRangesDescription: Enter page numbers or ranges separated by commas (e.g., 1,3,5-7)

toolInfo.title: Split PDF
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to extract specific pages from a PDF document. You can specify individual pages or ranges of pages to extract.

splitPdf.title: Split PDF
splitPdf.shortDescription: Extract specific pages from a PDF file

rotatePdf.title: Rotate PDF
rotatePdf.description: Rotate pages in a PDF document.
rotatePdf.pageRangesDescription: Enter page numbers or ranges separated by commas (e.g., 1,3,5-7)

toolInfo.title: How to Use the Rotate PDF Tool
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to rotate pages in a PDF document. You can rotate all pages or specify individual pages to rotate. Choose a rotation angle: 90° Clockwise, 180° (Upside down), or 270° (90° Counter-clockwise). To rotate specific pages, uncheck "Apply to all pages" and enter page numbers or ranges separated by commas (e.g., 1,3,5-7).

rotatePdf.title: Rotate PDF
rotatePdf.shortDescription: Rotate pages in a PDF document

compressPdf.lowCompressionDescription: Slightly reduce file size with minimal quality loss
compressPdf.mediumCompressionDescription: Balance between file size and quality
compressPdf.highCompressionDescription: Maximum file size reduction with some quality loss
compressPdf.errorReadingPdf: Failed to read PDF file. Please make sure it is a valid PDF.
compressPdf.title: Compress PDF
compressPdf.description: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality using Ghostscript
compressPdf.shortDescription: Compress PDF files securely in your browser

toolInfo.title: How to Use the Merge PDF Tool?
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to merge multiple PDF files into a single document. To use the tool, simply upload the PDF files you want to merge. The tool will then combine all pages from the input files into a single PDF document.

editor.title: PDF Editor
editor.description: Advanced PDF editor with annotation, form-fill, highlight, and export capabilities. Edit your PDFs directly in the browser with professional-grade tools including text insertion, drawing, highlighting, signing and form filling.
editor.shortDescription: Edit PDFs with advanced annotation, signing and editing tools

pdfToEpub.title: PDF to EPUB
pdfToEpub.description: Transform PDF documents into EPUB files for better e-reader compatibility.', icon: 'material-symbols:import-contacts', component: lazy(() => import('./index')), keywords: ['pdf', 'epub', 'convert', 'ebook'], path: 'pdf-to-epub', i18n: { name: 'pdf:pdfToEpub.title', description: 'pdf:pdfToEpub.description
pdfToEpub.shortDescription: Convert PDF files to EPUB format

pdfToPng.title: PDF to PNG
pdfToPng.description: Transform PDF documents into PNG panels.

protectPdf.title: Protect PDF
protectPdf.description: Add password protection to your PDF files securely in your browser
